model

Class ShoppingCart

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ShoppingCart

  • public class ShoppingCart
extends java.lang.Object
    ShoppingCart class represents the shopping cart, that is associated to an user.
    Version:
    1.4
    Author:
    Paolo D'Arienzo

        Parameters:
        product - which number has to be modified
        quantity - new number of items of that product
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - when the items searched is not present in the list

      • decrementInCart

        public void decrementInCart(Product product)
                     throws NoItemException,
                            java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Removes 1 item from the product in the list; if there is only 1 item left, removes the product from the cart
        Parameters:
        product - to decrement
        Throws:
        NoItemException - when there aren't items to decrease
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if an error occurs with the connection to the database
        See Also:
        ShoppingCartDAO.updateInDatabase(String, int, int)
